name: PINAPPLE NAI MIRIS SAUCE
description: Sweet Heat, Island Style Pineapple & Nai Miris Sauce is a tropical firecracker—tangy pineapple meets the intense heat of Nai Miris (Ghost Pepper), creating an explosive fusion of sweet and spicy flavors. Whether used as a marinade or a finishing sauce, it will elevate any dish to new heights of deliciousness. Best enjoyed with: – Grilled seafood (shrimp, lobster, fish) – Tacos, burritos, and quesadillas – Chicken wings and grilled meats – A spicy dip for chips or a spread for cheese and crackers Ingredients: Pineapple, Garlic, Ginger, Nai Miris (Ghost Pepper), Natural Coconut Vinegar, TCSH Special Blend Spices, Sugar 100% Natural | Preservative-Free | Artisan Quality | Homemade | 300 ml | 200 ml
